Keywords: Horsemen , Mystical , Past , Ruler , Warrior , X-Men
Real Name: En Sabah Nur
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) SWORD BEARER: This character starts the game with any Sword equipment equipped.
KRAKOA IS FOR ALL MUTANTS: When determining themed teams, characters with the Arakko keyword gain the X-Men keyword. // When a friendly character with the X-Men keyword would be hit with a close attack, if they can use Blades/Claws/Fangs they may roll a d6. If they do and the result is greater than the attacker's printed damage value, they evade the attack.
THE EXTERNAL GATE: Flurry, Phasing/Teleport. When Apocalypse uses Phasing/Teleport, after resolutions he may make a close attack.
DESTRUCTIVE PARRY: STOP. Invincible, Super Senses. Each time this click is revealed due to taking damage from an attack, KO an object equipped to the attacker. If the attacker was not equipped, deal them 1 penetrating damage.
